drug.name: ORM-12741
drug.description: ORM-12741 has been used in trials studying the basic science and treatment of Alzheimer's Disease.

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as benzofurans. These are organic compounds containing a benzene ring fused to a furan. Furan is a five-membered aromatic ring with four carbon atoms and one oxygen atom.

drug-interaction.name: Norepinephrine
drug-interaction.description: ORM-12741 may decrease the hypertensive activities of Norepinephrine.

drug-interaction.description: ORM-12741 may decrease the hypertensive activities of Epinephrine.
